    According to transfer expert Romano, Manchester United have reached an agreement in principle with Newcastle for Dubravka’s transfer

    With that in mind, it could be a matter of time before Manchester United are welcoming their new deputy to De Gea

    Dubravka would be bringing Premier League experience with him after four-and-a-half years with Newcastle

    Although unlikely to dislodge De Gea for most Premier League matches, there could be some decent opportunities for Dubravka at Old Trafford

    ['league', 'manchester', 'united', 'dubravka', 'newcastle']

  • AMD WON'T CHANGE LAUNCH PRICING FOR RYZEN 7000 SERIES, ACCORDING TO NEW LEAK

    https://www.theverge.com/2022/8/29/23326836/amd-ryzen-7000-series-desktop-cpus-pricing-leak

    08/30/2022, 01:07

    50.0% Shortened!

    AMD is expected to launch four CPUs in its Ryzen 7000 series (the “X” line) this evening, and a few hours ahead of the announcement, the pricing has already leaked

    The 7000 series is the direct successor to the 5000 desktop series — the 6000 series (currently trickling out in certain laptop models) skipped the desktop chips

    Much of what we know about these upcoming Ryzen 7000 CPUs comes from AMD’s Computex keynote earlier this year

    The pricing, if confirmed, would not come as a surprise — the Ryzen 5000 generation was widely considered to be priced high at release, and the new generation brings a significant increase in clock speed

    Still, some PC enthusiasts may see $300 for a six-core part as a bad deal since Intel’s competing Core i5-12400 part has a suggested retail price of under $200, and AMD’s own Ryzen 7 5700X (an eight-core chip from the last generation) can currently be found all over the place for under $300

    We’ve reached out to AMD for comment on this pricing leak

    ['amd', 'cpu', 'ryzen', 'series', 'price']

    AMD is expected to launch four CPUs in its Ryzen 7000 series (the “X” line) this evening, and a few hours ahead of the announcement, the pricing has already leaked

    The 7000 series is the direct successor to the 5000 desktop series — the 6000 series (currently trickling out in certain laptop models) skipped the desktop chips

    Much of what we know about these upcoming Ryzen 7000 CPUs comes from AMD’s Computex keynote earlier this year

    The pricing, if confirmed, would not come as a surprise — the Ryzen 5000 generation was widely considered to be priced high at release, and the new generation brings a significant increase in clock speed

    Still, some PC enthusiasts may see $300 for a six-core part as a bad deal since Intel’s competing Core i5-12400 part has a suggested retail price of under $200, and AMD’s own Ryzen 7 5700X (an eight-core chip from the last generation) can currently be found all over the place for under $300

    We’ve reached out to AMD for comment on this pricing leak

    The user embedded an image from Twitter account Apple Hub, which offered a quirky rendering of the rumored Pro design and cited a price "close to $1,000." According to Mac Otakara, the upcoming Apple Watch Series 8 “Pro” will feature a larger 47mm size and a flat display

    Apple Watch bands have been compatible across models ever since the launch of the first Apple Watch in 2015

    For those not going on day-long bikepacking or ultra-marathon excursions, the expected Apple Watch 8 and Apple Watch SE are likely to see a spec bump or other minor improvements, such as a body temperature sensor and the same kind of low-power but still app-capable mode as the Pro

    It's also long past time Apple retired the Apple Watch 3 from its lineup

    However, there is an increased demand for the latest Nintendo console

    So we might need to wait a few more years before seeing Nintendo Switch beat DS and take the throne as the most-selling Nintendo console in history

    Old Willow wanted to be our friend, and was trying perhaps a little to hard

    This isn’t Professor Willow

    It reads, Keep an eye out for Professor Willow..

    Keep an eye on him

    ['professor', 'willow', 'game', 'eye', 'like']

    https://www.lowyat.net/2022/283290/hp-victus-15l-gaming-desktop-my/

    08/30/2022

    64.71% Shortened!

    This is because we were not aware of its existence in Malaysia until we stumbled upon the desktop machine alongside both gaming laptops at Thunder Match Technology’s HP booth during last weekend’s Malaysia IT Fair

    We then cross-checked the model with HP Malaysia’s online store and found it there as well

    On the other hand, you can also choose to have the similar-spec unit that has an AMD Ryzen 5 5600G processor instead

    This variant is much more affordable at RM4,799 although the desktop is currently being listed on HP Malaysia’s online store for RM4,659 while Thunder Match sold it for even lower at RM4,499 last weekend

    In case you are not aware of it, AMD did not release the Ryzen 6000 Series processors for desktop machines which is why the Ryzen-based Victus 15L gaming desktop is still running on a Ryzen 5000 Series chip

    Instead, the company has decided to bring the Ryzen 7000 Series which has just been announced today, to the desktop segment instead and let the 6000 Series be a mobile-focused release

    08/30/2022

    76.92% Shortened!

    Samsung Electronics recently announced the global launch of SmartThings Home Life, offering consumers worldwide a more holistic smart home experience

    Samsung’s SmartThings Home Life, introduced at this year’s Bespoke Home 2022 virtual event, is currently available in Canada and integrates the SmartThings Cooking and SmartThings Home Care services

    SmartThings Home Life is a new addition to the SmartThings app[1] [2], which provides centralized and integrated control over your Samsung appliances[3]

    Connecting the convenience of SmartThings services, which includes SmartThings Cooking and SmartThings Home Care in Canada[4] [5], SmartThings Home Life expands the quality of your life at home and puts you in control, all from your smartphone

    In the SmartThings app, users can simply tap the “Life” tab to navigate to SmartThings Home to unlock a new level of home connectivity

    What’s more, the Family Hub also doubles as a home control for the SmartThings app

    ['samsung', 'smartthings', 'home', 'life', 'cooking']

  • INDIA'S ADANI IS FIRST ASIAN TO BECOME WORLD'S THIRD-RICHEST PERSON

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/article/indias-adani-first-asian-become-worlds-thirdrichest-person

    08/30/2022

    72.73% Shortened!

    With a US$137.4 billion fortune, Adani has overtaken France’s Bernard Arnault and now trails just Elon Musk and Jeff Bezos of the US in the ranking

    While its Carmichael mine in Australia has been criticised by environmentalists, it pledged in November to invest US$70 billion in green energy to become the world’s largest renewable-energy producer

    All told, Adani has added US$60.9 billion to his fortune in 2022 alone, five times more than anyone else

    He first overtook Ambani as the richest Asian in February, became a centibillionaire in April and surpassed Microsoft Corp.’s Bill Gates as the world’s fourth-richest person last month

    Adani was able to move past some of the world’s richest US billionaires partly because they’ve recently boosted their philanthropy

    Adani, too, has increased his charitable giving, pledging in June to donate US$7.7 billion for social causes to mark his 60th birthday

    ['search', 'adani', 'coal', 'world', 'richest']

  • NISSAN Z BUILT FROM 370Z PARTS FOR AFFORDABILITY, OR IT MAY NOT HAVE BEEN APPROVED FOR SALE - PRODUCT CHIEF - PAULTAN.ORG

    https://paultan.org/2022/08/30/nissan-z-built-from-370z-parts-for-affordability-or-it-may-not-have-been-approved-for-sale-product-chief/

    08/30/2022

    57.14% Shortened!

    A handwritten note by Nissan Z chief product specialist Hiroshi Tamura sighted by Car Expert offered reasons for the 370Z no longer selling as well as the carmaker had hoped, as well as setting out targets for what its successor, the latest Nissan Z, should achieve

    The 370Z’s lack of sales success was attributed to its exterior design, performance, and the lack of updates, according to Tamura’s handwritten note, Car Expert reported

    Hence, the targets set for the new Z was to have an all-new exterior, a partial interior update and an engine output of around 400 hp, which was considered only doable with a twin-turbo engine, according to the note

    Therefore, Tamura believes that Nissan’s approval for the Z to go on sale was due to the new car’s relative affordability for both the carmaker and for the customers by being able to produce a car that could meet performance expectations with the existing twin-turbo engine already developed for Infiniti, and on a platform already used to build the 370Z

    Got no money to develop new car so recycle parts from old cars, recycle design from old car

    Under Ghosn, 350Z was new, GTR was new, 370Z was new, so this is karma biting Jap arses for being ungrateful

    ['car', 'nissan', 'august', '370z', 'new']

  • THERE'S A NEWER, LIGHTER PS5 MODEL AVAILABLE IN ONE COUNTRY ONLY RIGHT NOW

    https://www.gamesradar.com/theres-a-newer-lighter-ps5-model-available-in-one-country-only-right-now/

    08/29/2022, 23:09

    73.91% Shortened!

    GamesRadar+ is supported by its audience

    The CFI-1200, a lighter PS5 model, is reportedly on sale in Australia There's a newer, lighter PS5 on sale in Australia, according to Press Start (opens in new tab)

    The Australian site reports that the CFI-1200 model, first listed by Japanese retailers, is currently available for purchase in stores.  Both disc and disc-less PS5 models are lighter than their original counterparts, with the new digital PS5 weighing a little over 5lbs and the new disc version weighing about 8.5lbs

    That means that the new model of the PS5 weighs about a pound and a half less than the original (which was just shy of 10lbs) and less than the digital PS5 did at launch (which weighed about 8.6lbs).  While it's not clear what Sony has done to make the new versions of the PS5 lighter, it's likely something to do with what's going on under the hood

    In Canada, the standard PS5 is now CAD $649.99 while the digital is CAD $519.99, in Australia, it's AUD $799.95 and AUD $649.95 respectively

    Visit our corporate site (opens in new tab)

    ['lighter', 'ps5', 'model', 'australia', 'new']

    GamesRadar+ is supported by its audience

    The CFI-1200, a lighter PS5 model, is reportedly on sale in Australia There's a newer, lighter PS5 on sale in Australia, according to Press Start (opens in new tab)

    The Australian site reports that the CFI-1200 model, first listed by Japanese retailers, is currently available for purchase in stores.  Both disc and disc-less PS5 models are lighter than their original counterparts, with the new digital PS5 weighing a little over 5lbs and the new disc version weighing about 8.5lbs

    That means that the new model of the PS5 weighs about a pound and a half less than the original (which was just shy of 10lbs) and less than the digital PS5 did at launch (which weighed about 8.6lbs).  While it's not clear what Sony has done to make the new versions of the PS5 lighter, it's likely something to do with what's going on under the hood

    Samsung Android Tablets Firmware Updates

    Samsung’s first device to run software based on Android 12L is the new Galaxy Z Fold4

    Of course, the tablet-centric version of Android is coming to Samsung’s tablets too, starting with the Tab S8 series

    The Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 series is getting updated to Android 12L What’s new? The taskbar feature lets you quickly switch between and launch apps (including app pairs in split-screen mode), without having to use DeX mode

    Also, a two-finger gesture can be used to flip between full-screen and split-screen modes

    The update enables the Tab S8 slates to extract text from images (Chinese, French, German, Italian, Korean, Portuguese and Spanish are supported, in addition to English)

    ['samsung', 'android', 'tablet', 'update', 'version']

    https://www.gsmarena.com/more_evidence_surfaces_that_the_iphone_14_pro_duo_will_support_30w_chargers-news-55566.php

    08/29/2022, 23:08

    45.45% Shortened!

    Back in March analyst Ming-Chi Kuo predicted that Apple will introduce a 30W GaN charger this year

    Another leakster, Kioriku, reports that the 14 Pro and 14 Pro Max will only charge at 30W near 0% and before dropping down to 27-25W (that’s how a typical charge curve works)

    The current iPhone 13 Pro and 13 Pro Max charge at 23W and 27W, respectively, so this will be a fairly small bump, unless Apple goes for a more aggressive charge curve (doubtful)

    Apple already sells several GaN chargers, including the 140W power brick for the new 16” MacBook Pros and the 35W dual chargers that launched alongside the new M2 MacBook Air

    Apple's old (non-GaN) 30W charger • The new 35W dual USB-C GaN chargers Also, we’re not holding out hope that Apple’s 30W GaN charger will be included with the iPhone 14 Pro and 14 Pro Max phones, it will almost certainly be a separate purchase

    As for the third-party charger, it will come with a USB-C to Lighting cable

    ['apple', '30w', 'gan', 'charger', 'new']

    08/29/2022, 22:09

    90.0% Shortened!

    Now, the older member of the Nova family- the Huawei Nova 8 series is receiving the August 2022 HarmonyOS update.

    Huawei recently released the August 2022 HarmonyOS update for Huawei Nova 8, Nova 8 Pro 5G, and Nova 8 Pro 4G smartphones

    The August 2022 update in Huawei Nova 8 series comes over the HarmonyOS 2.0.0.272 build version running on the HarmonyOS 2.0.0.268 base version

    You can download the update on your Nova 8 smartphone through the latest version of “MY Huawei app”.

    Recently, Huawei rolled out the July 2022 security update for the Nova 8 series with the HarmonyOS 2.0.0.268 version

    Now is the time, to update your compatible Nova 9 and Nova 9 pro smartphones over the August 2022 optimization update.

    This works out to 30 days of Xbox Game Pass Ultimate being converted to 18 days of membership on the friends and family plan

    In response, Microsoft has confirmed that it currently has no plans to increase the price of its Xbox Series X|S consoles and Nintendo has also stated that it will not raise the price of Switch consoles despite growing costs in producing the Switch.

  • MAFIA TURNS 20: WHY THE SERIES NEEDS TO LOOK BACK TO GO FORWARD

    https://www.digitaltrends.com/gaming/mafia-series-retrospective-20th-anniversary/

    08/29/2022, 21:09

    89.83% Shortened!

    Why trust us? The Mafia video game series turns 20 today

    While the first two Mafia games were traditional mafia stories, the 2016 follow-up would go in a wildly different direction

    As it’s a story about a black man in the 1970s, Mafia III’s world is harsh and racist toward Lincoln Clay, but in a way that’s highly condemned, never glorified, unlike Mafia 2

    It’s definitely the one Mafia game that I can fully recommend playing due to its plot, but keep in mind that Mafia III  contains the woes of many modern open-world games

    After Mafia III, it seems like Hanger 13 could’ve gone right into developing Mafia IV and built upon what it learned from Mafia III, but it didn’t

    Even if it’s now in active development, the gap between Mafia games will likely match or surpass the length of time between the original Mafia and Mafia II

    ['mafia', 'game', 'series', 'world', 'story']

    Why trust us? The Mafia video game series turns 20 today

    While the first two Mafia games were traditional mafia stories, the 2016 follow-up would go in a wildly different direction

    As it’s a story about a black man in the 1970s, Mafia III’s world is harsh and racist toward Lincoln Clay, but in a way that’s highly condemned, never glorified, unlike Mafia 2

    It’s definitely the one Mafia game that I can fully recommend playing due to its plot, but keep in mind that Mafia III  contains the woes of many modern open-world games

    After Mafia III, it seems like Hanger 13 could’ve gone right into developing Mafia IV and built upon what it learned from Mafia III, but it didn’t

    Even if it’s now in active development, the gap between Mafia games will likely match or surpass the length of time between the original Mafia and Mafia II

    ['mafia', 'game', 'series', 'world', 'story']



  • IPHONE 14 LAUNCH EVENT IS 'ANOTHER PIVOTAL MOMENT' FOR APPLE - WEDBUSH BY INVESTING.COM

    Supply chain checks on Apple proved to be “very firm” as far as the initial order for 90 million iPhone 14 units is concerned

    “This speaks to the underlying demand story that Apple anticipates for this next iPhone release with our estimates that 240 million of 1 billion iPhone users worldwide have not upgraded their phones in over 3.5 years,” the analyst said in a client note

    He is especially positive amid the strong average selling prices (ASPs) amid a consumer shift to iPhone Pro and Pro Max

    He sees a “likely low bar” for Apple to beat as the Street looks for the company to ship out about 220 million iPhone units in FY23

    “In the key China region we estimate that roughly 30% of iPhone consumers are in the window for an upgrade cycle,” the analyst concluded

    “This speaks to the underlying demand story that Apple anticipates for this next iPhone release with our estimates that 240 million of 1 billion iPhone users worldwide have not upgraded their phones in over 3.5 years,” the analyst said in a client note

    He is especially positive amid the strong average selling prices (ASPs) amid a consumer shift to iPhone Pro and Pro Max

    He sees a “likely low bar” for Apple to beat as the Street looks for the company to ship out about 220 million iPhone units in FY23

    “In the key China region we estimate that roughly 30% of iPhone consumers are in the window for an upgrade cycle,” the analyst concluded

    Are you sure you want to block %USER_NAME%? By doing so, you and %USER_NAME% will not be able to see

    ['analyst', 'apple', 'iphone', 'user', 'price']

    Instagram also introduced a dual camera mode earlier this year, but Snapchat's dual camera works with all its AR lenses

    According to Snapchat, the dual camera feature was originally intended for Snap's Creator Cam in Director Mode, but the feature's expanded to the main Snapchat app..

    The AR elements of Snapchat's dual camera feature look the most intriguing and transformative

    At the moment, the dual camera mode runs on iOS, needing an iPhone XS or later to work

  • POLITICAL INTERFERENCE INTO JUDICIARY UNCONSTITUTIONAL, SAY LEGAL PROFESSION BODIES

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/08/29/calls-to-interfere-with-judicial-process-an-abuse-of-power-says-malaysian-legal-society

    08/29/2022, 20:10

    78.57% Shortened!

    The bar professional bodies, however, said that they trust the Prime Minister to do the right thing and not to act to the contrary, as that would be an unconscionable abuse of power and a travesty to justice

    "Political interference in any case – especially one of tremendous public interest - directly encroaches upon the functions and duties of the Attorney General and the court

    They said they were appalled by calls of political figures for the Prime Minister to interfere in the judicial process

    "Some have even gone as far as demanding direct interference in the Federal Court concerning the case of former prime minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak and to change the current Attorney General

    The three legal bodies condemn any act of politicians seeking for an intervention by the Prime Minister in an ongoing matter before the judiciary at all material points

    Their unjustifiable statements were instead of turning Malaysia into a legal pariah where rule of law is not sacrosanct

    ['politician', 'judiciary', 'attorney', 'general', 'say']

  • JUST RAFIZI'S OPINION, MUHYDDIN SAYS OF PAKATAN COOPERATION SNUB

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/08/29/just-rafizis-opinion-muhyiddin-says-of-pakatan-cooperation-snub/25406

    08/29/2022, 20:09

    50.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise PUTRAJAYA, Aug 29 — Parti Pribumi Bersatu Malaysia (Bersatu) would work with any party except Barisan Nasional, Tan Sri Muhyiddin Yassin said today after PKR deputy president Rafizi Ramli insisted Pakatan Harapan would reject such a cooperation for the 15th general election

    Muhyiddin said Bersatu and the Perikatan Nasional coalition’s main concern was to prevent the same abuses from Barisan Nasional’s rule and ensure the country was politically stable

    The former prime minister also insisted that Rafizi’s rejection was simply the latter’s own opinion

    “This isn’t my concern, it’s the public’s concerns

    So, are you thinking about your party or are you thinking about yourself,” he asked Rafizi after chairing the National Recovery Council (MPN) meeting in Putrajaya today

    I don’t want the same things that destroyed our country to happen again

    ['bersatu', 'would', 'party', 'nasional', 'say']

  • ACCUSED OF STEALING PHD STUDENT’S PROJECT, UM COUNTERS WITH OWN POLICE REPORT

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/08/29/accused-of-stealing-phd-students-project-um-counters-with-own-police-report/25404

    08/29/2022, 20:09

    68.42% Shortened!

    The university noted that the PhD student, who made the allegation public through the popular video platform TikTok, had conducted his research with resources and assistance provided by the university

    It is the university’s policy that all academic research and projects are its properties,” the university said

    The student, believed to be of Middle Eastern descent, claimed on TikTok that the project supervisor of the research he had worked on had changed the password and username of the software that he developed

    After he discovered the purported theft, the student said his attempt to get clarification from the university was met with hostility

    The student has filed a police report against the university management

    The university authorities said it has lodged a counter police report to deny the student’s allegation and suggested that it may take legal action.

    ['student', 'allegation', 'research', 'university', 'project']

  • AMD RYZEN 7000 PRICING LEAKS AHEAD OF LAUNCH, RYZEN 9 7950X REPORTEDLY FOR 799 USD

    https://videocardz.com/newz/amd-ryzen-7000-pricing-leaks-ahead-of-launch-ryzen-9-7950x-reportedly-for-799-usd

    08/29/2022, 20:08

    57.14% Shortened!

    According to Wccftech, the pricing of Ryzen 7000 series has now been leaked

    The flagship 16-core Ryzen 9 7950X CPU is said to cost 799 USD, the same price as Ryzen 9 5950X at launch

    In fact, even the 12-core Ryzen 9 7900X should cost 549 USD, which is again the same MSRP as 5900X with Zen3 architecture

    The 8-core Zen4 CPU called Ryzen 7 7700X will cost 449 USD, same MSRP as 5800X and 5800X3D at launch

    There is no 7800X SKU for now, but it may appear later with 3D V-Cache. Finally, the 6-core Ryzen 5 7600X would cost 299 USD, which was the initial MSRP for 6-core Ryzen 5 5600X and later 8-core Ryzen 7 5700X

    Overall, the rumored pricing of Ryzen 7000 is very consistent and similar to Ryzen 5000 lineup

    ['wccftech', 'price', 'zen4', 'cpu', 'ryzen']

    In fact, even the 12-core Ryzen 9 7900X should cost 549 USD, which is again the same MSRP as 5900X with Zen3 architecture

    The 8-core Zen4 CPU called Ryzen 7 7700X will cost 449 USD, same MSRP as 5800X and 5800X3D at launch

    There is no 7800X SKU for now, but it may appear later with 3D V-Cache. Finally, the 6-core Ryzen 5 7600X would cost 299 USD, which was the initial MSRP for 6-core Ryzen 5 5600X and later 8-core Ryzen 7 5700X

  • STOP PRIVACY INVASION, KNOW HOW TO TURN OFF IPHONE PRECISE LOCATION FEATURE

    https://tech.hindustantimes.com/how-to/stop-privacy-invasion-know-how-to-turn-off-iphone-precise-location-feature-71661772159899.html

    08/29/2022, 20:07

    57.14% Shortened!

    Have you ever opened a newly-installed app and noticed an option pop-up requesting access to your location? This is the location setting on your iPhone which grants apps permission to track your current location

    However, to make sure your privacy is not violated, IOS 15 allows you to turn off the Precise Location setting on your iPhone

    However, some apps utilize this service and might stop working if you turn off your precise location

    Apps like Maps might stop working or malfunction if you turn the location off

    However, if you still want to turn it off, here's how you can do it

    To turn off Precise Location, tap on the “Precise Location” toggle and turn it off.  Follow HT Tech for the latest tech news and reviews , also keep up with us

    ['app', 'access', 'location', 'set', 'apps']

    Have you ever opened a newly-installed app and noticed an option pop-up requesting access to your location? This is the location setting on your iPhone which grants apps permission to track your current location

    However, to make sure your privacy is not violated, IOS 15 allows you to turn off the Precise Location setting on your iPhone

    However, some apps utilize this service and might stop working if you turn off your precise location

    Apps like Maps might stop working or malfunction if you turn the location off

    However, if you still want to turn it off, here's how you can do it

    To turn off Precise Location, tap on the “Precise Location” toggle and turn it off.  Follow HT Tech for the latest tech news and reviews , also keep up with us

    ['app', 'access', 'location', 'set', 'apps']

    At Gamescom 2022, High On Life showed off 25 minutes of footage and the development team were present to discuss the future of the game

    Following an initial release date of October 25, it was announced earlier this month that the game has been delayed until December 13

    Squanch Games has said this is due to the studio wanting to “polish” the game and deliver “the best possible gaming experience” for High On Life

    In other video game news, PlayStation has acquired Savage Game Studios and added it to the newly-formed PlayStation Studios Mobile Division

  • WARNING: DESTINY 2’S RESILIENCE ARC 3.0 BUG IS ONE OF ITS WORST EVER

    https://www.forbes.com/sites/paultassi/2022/08/29/warning-destiny-2s-resilience-arc-30-bug-is-one-of-its-worst-ever/

    08/29/2022, 20:07

    68.42% Shortened!

    Destiny 2 While this bug has been going on since the launch of Destiny 2’s Season of Plunder, I didn’t really experience it in full until I ran the King’s Fall raid last night

    You may notice it a bit in normal seasonal content like Expeditions or Ketchcrash, but it is really noticeable when you do harder content like the raid or stuff at a higher power level

    I was trying to run arc 3.0 Warlock last night during the raid, and I barely dragged myself through Totems

    Destiny 2 The bug seems to go above and beyond just turning Resilience off, as I feel like it almost makes you take more damage than you would have before Resilience was changed to a damage-reducing stat

    A theory is that since Bungie bases most base stat values on Tier 3 (30) stats, that if Resilience truly has “shut off” and is at zero on Warlock and Titan, that you may be taking even more damage than you might otherwise

    Bungie does know this issue exists

    ['bug', 'raid', 'last', 'bungie', 'resilience']

    I was trying to run arc 3.0 Warlock last night during the raid, and I barely dragged myself through Totems

    Destiny 2 The bug seems to go above and beyond just turning Resilience off, as I feel like it almost makes you take more damage than you would have before Resilience was changed to a damage-reducing stat

    https://www.soompi.com/article/1542672wpp/seo-ji-hoon-so-ju-yeon-and-more-boast-great-synchronization-with-original-webtoon-characters-in-new-drama-poster

    08/29/2022

    50.0% Shortened!

    Upcoming web drama “Seasons of Blossom” (working title) released new posters! Based on the popular webtoon of the same name, drama “Seasons of Blossom” tells the story of love and friendship of 18-year-old youths at Seoyeon High School

    The poster captures “the teenagers from the past,” Lee Ha Min (Seo Ji Hoon) and Han So Mang (So Ju Yeon), and “the teenagers in the present,” Lee Jae Min (Kim Min Kyu), Yoon Bo Mi (Kang Hye Won), and Choi Jin Young (Yoon Hyun Soo), standing side by side next to the window in an art classroom that is full of sunlight

    Lee Ha Min and Han So Mang are dressed in summer school uniforms, while Lee Jae Min, Yoon Bo Mi, and Choi Jin Young are wearing spring school uniforms

    Beside Lee Ha Min, who appears cheerful on the outside but can be quite cynical, sits the timid yet determined Han So Mang

    Next to her are Lee Jae Min, Seoyeon High School’s most popular student who always puts on a smiling face, followed by Yoon Bo Mi, the school queen who is kind and pretty, and Choi Jin Young, who looks tough on the outside but is unexpectedly kind

    Anticipation is high as to what will happen between these friends

    08/29/2022, 19:07

    62.5% Shortened!

    Foxconn factory in the southwestern Sichuan province had to be shut down due to the higher temperatures

    Now, with the heat wave easing, Foxconn is operating at normal capacity again.

    The Chengdu plant of Foxconn, which assembles iPads for Apple, began to operate at normal capacity again on Thursday, a person close to the factory confirmed

    As of now, people’s focus has been on the September 7 event, in which the Cupertino company will unveil new iPhone 14 and Apple Watch models

    9to5Mac has been reporting a new 10th-generation iPad base model alongside two new iPad Pro versions

    Add 9to5Mac to your Google News feed.

    08/29/2022, 19:07

    79.31% Shortened!

    But the focus is at the front, where the V25 gets a 50MP selfie camera, although the V23’s second 8MP ultra-wide has been ditched

    Sitting at the front of the device is a 6.44-inch Full HD+ AMOLED display with a teardrop cutout for the selfie camera, a 90Hz refresh rate and HDR10+ support

    The V25 retains the flat front, back and sides of the V23, along with a rectangular camera bump

    A Diamond Black variant is also available

    Meanwhile, the main camera remains the same 64MP unit as before, although you no longer get an 8MP ultra-wide; a 2MP depth sensor takes its place

    There’s still a 2MP macro shooter, but the selfie camera is now a 32MP unit instead of 50MP

    “The document is a research document regarding a case that is still under trial and it is the view of the research unit as a reference for the judge

    “According to the complainant, the document will be amended based on the research and is not the decision of the court,” he said in a statement

    “This media report claimed that the decision by the court to find Rosmah Mansor guilty has already been made,” said ACP Beh

    Report it to us

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['police', 'statement', 'judgment', 'say', 'court']

    08/29/2022, 18:09

    73.91% Shortened!

    Both Vivo devices come in Diamond Black and Sunrise Gold, with Aquamarine Blue being exclusive to the V25

    On the camera front, the devices share a similar triple camera setup for the main shooter – sporting a 64-megapixel main camera, a 8-megapixel super wide-angle camera (2-megapixel for the V25e), and a 2-megapixel Super Macro camera

    The V25 is also armed with a 50-megapixel selfie camera – which Vivo claims is the highest resolution selfie camera in the industry – while the V25e has a 32-megapixel selfie camera

    Both devices include Vivo's Bokeh Flare Portrait feature, which the company claims will improve portrait taking performance while outdoors and at night

    The devices also include Vivo’s Extended RAM 3.0 feature, which automatically allocates up to 8GB RAM from the internal storage for use as virtual RAM

    https://www.nme.com/news/gaming-news/dr-disrespect-says-sniper-headshots-should-be-eliminations-in-all-shooters-3299821

    08/29/2022, 18:08

    50.0% Shortened!

    He believes the one-shot potential of a sniper should be rewarded with the instant kill if the weapon “requires skill” to use

    He then claims a “toddler could get a knock” with the MW Kar98k in Warzone due to its instant aim down sights capability, bullet velocity, plentiful ammo and strong aim assist whilst having no bullet drop

    A headshot with a sniper should be an automatic knock or elimination in any video game

    Another follower said that “bullet drop and ballistics [are] needed in every game for [a] sniper,” continuing that this would make it a reward for being skillful with a sniper weapon

    It’s certainly not the first time Dr Disrespect has had an opinion that’s divided responses, and it’s doubtful it’ll be the last either

    © 2022 NME is part of NME Networks.

  • LEAKER CLAIMS TWO GEFORCE RTX 4070 SPECIFICATIONS ARE NOW BEING CONSIDERED

    https://videocardz.com/newz/leaker-claims-two-geforce-rtx-4070-specifications-are-now-being-considered

    08/29/2022, 17:12

    62.5% Shortened!

    According to Kopite7kimi, NVIDIA is now considering two possible specifications for its RTX 4070 graphics card.  One step forward, one step back

    Initial rumors claimed RTX 4070 will launch with 10 GB and 160-bit GDDR6 memory configuration, later to be ‘updated’ to 12GB and 192-bit spec

    Furthermore, this card would have limited memory size to 10 GB and as a result narrower bus width to 160-bit

    Kopite earlier claimed that the total board power is 300W, but now it is said to be 285W or 250W depending on the SKU

    Total board power is not the same spec as TDP though, but it should still be higher than RTX 3070 non-Ti

    The RTX 4070 is expected to make a debut in October alongside RTX 4090 and RTX 4080

    ['rumor', 'kopite7kimi', 'rtx', 'card', 'bit']

    According to Kopite7kimi, NVIDIA is now considering two possible specifications for its RTX 4070 graphics card.  One step forward, one step back

    Initial rumors claimed RTX 4070 will launch with 10 GB and 160-bit GDDR6 memory configuration, later to be ‘updated’ to 12GB and 192-bit spec

    Furthermore, this card would have limited memory size to 10 GB and as a result narrower bus width to 160-bit

    Kopite earlier claimed that the total board power is 300W, but now it is said to be 285W or 250W depending on the SKU

    Total board power is not the same spec as TDP though, but it should still be higher than RTX 3070 non-Ti

    The RTX 4070 is expected to make a debut in October alongside RTX 4090 and RTX 4080

  • ROYAL LAKE CLUB KUALA LUMPUR REMOVES NAJIB AS PATRON

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/article/royal-lake-club-kuala-lumpur-removes-najib-patron

    08/29/2022, 17:09

    45.45% Shortened!

    The decision was made in a meeting held by the club's general committee last Thursday (Aug 25), two days after the Federal Court upheld Najib's graft conviction and sentence in the SRC International Sdn Bhd case, for which he is now serving a 12-year sentence in jail

    "The general committee in its meeting on Aug 25, pursuant to the conviction of the above-named by the Federal Court on Aug 23, revoked the club's patronship conferred on Datuk Seri Najib Razak on June 1, 2011, with immediate effect," read the club's brief letter titled "Revocation of Patronship, Datuk Seri Mohd Najib Razak" that was addressed to members and sighted by The Edge

    Founded on Aug 16, 1890, Royal Lake Club Kuala Lumpur is located within Lake Gardens here, near the Parliament House

    At the time, SRC was a subsidiary of 1Malaysia Development Bhd

    Najib was then sentenced to 12 years in jail and fined RM210 million for abuse of power, and 10 years jail each for each of the CBT and money laundering charges

    His conviction and sentence were subsequently upheld by the Court of Appeal on Dec 8, 2021, and later by the Federal Court last Tuesday

    ['search', 'edge', 'aug', 'club', 'najib']

    The decision was made in a meeting held by the club's general committee last Thursday (Aug 25), two days after the Federal Court upheld Najib's graft conviction and sentence in the SRC International Sdn Bhd case, for which he is now serving a 12-year sentence in jail

    "The general committee in its meeting on Aug 25, pursuant to the conviction of the above-named by the Federal Court on Aug 23, revoked the club's patronship conferred on Datuk Seri Najib Razak on June 1, 2011, with immediate effect," read the club's brief letter titled "Revocation of Patronship, Datuk Seri Mohd Najib Razak" that was addressed to members and sighted by The Edge

    Founded on Aug 16, 1890, Royal Lake Club Kuala Lumpur is located within Lake Gardens here, near the Parliament House

    At the time, SRC was a subsidiary of 1Malaysia Development Bhd

    Najib was then sentenced to 12 years in jail and fined RM210 million for abuse of power, and 10 years jail each for each of the CBT and money laundering charges

    We also get to know that the two CCDs on the Ryzen 9 7950X are called Durango while the individual cores are named Persephone

  • EYEING THE IPHONE 14, AIRPODS PRO 2? FOR MUSIC LOVERS, HERE IS SOME EXCITING NEWS

    https://tech.hindustantimes.com/tech/news/eyeing-the-iphone-14-airpods-pro-2-for-music-lovers-here-is-some-exciting-news-71661750153778.html

    08/29/2022, 17:09

    68.42% Shortened!

    Apple is reportedly getting ready for future devices that will enable Bluetooth 5.2 on iPhone 14 and AirPods Pro 2

    As a result, the entry is likely related to Bluetooth 5.2

    If it happens, iPhone 14 and AirPods Pro 2, will likely to get a couple of very useful audio upgrades The Bluetooth 5.2 support will be advantageous for AirPods given the fact that the standard provides support for LE Audio in addition to other enhancements to wireless audio streaming

    The Bluetooth Low Energy LE standard includes LE Audio

    Further, it can have a separate Bluetooth connection with the iPhone to avoid audio playback becoming out of sync

    And hence, Apple is expected to bring the same on second-generation AirPods Pro, and iPhone 14

    ['apple', 'bluetooth', 'iphone', 'airpods', 'support']

    Apple is reportedly getting ready for future devices that will enable Bluetooth 5.2 on iPhone 14 and AirPods Pro 2

    As a result, the entry is likely related to Bluetooth 5.2

    If it happens, iPhone 14 and AirPods Pro 2, will likely to get a couple of very useful audio upgrades The Bluetooth 5.2 support will be advantageous for AirPods given the fact that the standard provides support for LE Audio in addition to other enhancements to wireless audio streaming

    The Bluetooth Low Energy LE standard includes LE Audio

    Further, it can have a separate Bluetooth connection with the iPhone to avoid audio playback becoming out of sync

    And hence, Apple is expected to bring the same on second-generation AirPods Pro, and iPhone 14

    ['apple', 'bluetooth', 'iphone', 'airpods', 'support']



  • STUDENT PROTESTER SHOT BY HONG KONG POLICE CONVICTED

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2022/08/29/student-protester-shot-by-hong-kong-police-convicted

    08/29/2022, 17:09

    69.57% Shortened!

    Monday, 29 Aug 2022

    The moment a Hong Kong police officer shot a 21-year-old protester in the abdomen

    He briefly grappled with a protester wearing white, as Chow approached

    He then fired at Chow, hitting him in the stomach

    A second student protester, Woo Tsz-kin, 22, was also charged with trying to take the officer's weapon and obstruction

    On Monday, both Woo and Chow were convicted by District Court Judge Adriana Tse after a six-month trial

    Both Chow and Woo were remanded on Monday to wait for sentencing in October

    ['monday', 'hong', 'kong', 'police', 'officer']

  • SAMSUNG RELEASES A VIDEO OF THEIR RIGOROUS METHOD FOR TESTING THE DURABILITY OF THE FOLD 4 & FLIP 4

    https://www.firstpost.com/tech/news-analysis/samsung-releases-a-video-of-their-rigorous-method-for-testing-the-durability-of-the-fold-4-flip-4-11136361.html

    08/29/2022, 17:07

    50.0% Shortened!

    Over the years, smartphone manufacturers like Samsung have redesigned and refined the design of their hinges to the point where they are extremely durable

    Even the foldable screens that most smartphone brands source from Samsung have gone up exponentially in quality and endurance

    To showcase just how durable their latest foldable devices, The Galaxy Flip 4 and the Galaxy Fold 4 are, Samsung shared a video showing some of the tests they have undergone before being deemed fit for release

    The back panel of the phone is applied by one set of machines and then pressed firmly by another

    Then the device is onto the functional testing to make sure the screen works with S Pen, the Samsung Pay service is okay, touch and proximity sensors, as well as the wireless coil also need to go through the process

    We also get to see the water resistance test that has multiple valves, spraying water on the foldable from all angles

    ['review', 'foldable', 'big', 'fold', 'screen']

  • WHAT DID SAMSUNG DO TO SAM? AND WHY DID THEY CHOOSE THIS SILLY BUG AS A VIRTUAL AVATAR INSTEAD?

    https://soyacincau.com/2022/08/29/what-did-samsung-do-to-sam-and-why-did-they-choose-this-silly-bug-as-a-virtual-avatar-instead/

    08/29/2022, 17:07

    45.45% Shortened!

    Samsung has just unveiled a new virtual avatar, a weird-looking cartoon bug called G-NUSMAS

    “Borrowing an idea from Internet meme, which shows customers’ affectionate interest in Samsung Electronics, a friendly and pleasant avatar has come out into the world… By letting our whimsical and brilliant alien show different sides of Samsung to the public, I hope our consumers can feel more familiar with our brand,” said YH Lee, the Chief Marketing Officer and Head of Global Marketing at Samsung Electronics

    And if you haven’t figure it out by now, G-NUSMAS is also SAMSUNG backwards

    As for what Samsung plans to do with this virtual avatar, they said that they will be releasing a series of short-form videos about the story of G∙NUSMAS

    The series will start from birth and accidental arrival on Earth, to its journey as it works, plays, and has “a variety of experiences” at Samsung’s headquarters.  “G∙NUSMAS’ bright and cheerful personality will shine through the videos as it sings, dances and interacts with a variety of Samsung devices, from jumping around on a monitor to dancing on the screen of a smartphone,” continued Samsung

    Even though I think Sam, a leaked mascot for Samsung, would have been a more popular character, I can see why Samsung was a bit unsure to launch her

    ['samsung', 'virtual', 'avatar', 'nusmas', 'internet']

    Google has announced in a blog post (opens in new tab) that it will roll out the ability to unmute yourself in a Google Meet conference by just holding down the space bar

    Nonetheless, it's an excellent addition to Meet

    The update comes at a time when Google's merger of Meet and Duo is still perplexing

    Google changed Duo's icon and name a few weeks ago to reflect Meet's takeover

    Google is now bringing back the Duo icon, which, when tapped, takes you to Meet

  • AMD B650E "EXTREME" MOTHERBOARD CHIPSET HAS BEEN CONFIRMED

    https://videocardz.com/newz/amd-b650e-extreme-motherboard-chipset-has-been-confirmed

    08/29/2022, 16:09

    45.45% Shortened!

    Leaker shares slides from a meeting with AMD

    For the non-Extreme series this means support for either the graphics or storage (or more precisely PCIe slot or M.2 slot)

    Unlike the X670 series, the B650E chipset will feature one Promontory 21 chipset, effectively reducing the number of available lanes

    AMD already confirmed it is developing a B650 chipset, but thus far the Extreme variant was only seen in the leaks

    This new slide confirms that AMD is indeed making at least four different chipsets for its AM5 socket

    You can contact us through our contact page or provide a tip through this page

  • PROSECUTION'S APPEAL AGAINST ACQUITTAL OF SAMIRAH, TEENS SET FOR CASE MANAGEMENT ON SEPT 5

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/08/29/prosecution039s-appeal-against-acquittal-of-samirah-teens-set-for-case-management-on-sept-5

    08/29/2022, 16:08

    57.14% Shortened!

    Rahmat Mohamed Hazlan, one of their lawyers, when contacted, confirmed the case management on Sept 5 will be conducted via Zoom before a Court of Appeal deputy registrar

    On June 21, this year, the Shah Alam High Court acquitted and discharged Samirah, 47, who is Nazrin's widow and the two teenagers aged 19 and 16 after finding that the prosecution failed to establish a prima facie case against the trio

    In his decision, the judge ruled that the evidence that Samirah and the teenagers were the last persons with the Nazrin, cannot be said to lead to his murder

    On June 23, the Attorney General's Chambers filed its notice of appeal against the High Court's decision to acquit Samirah and the teenagers from the murder charge

    Meanwhile, on June 30, Samirah and the teenagers also filed an appeal to challenge certain of the High Court's findings of facts including the findings that the fire which broke out in Nazrin's room was "done deliberately"

    The High Court judge, in his oral judgment, had said the court accepted the testimonies of the Kuala Lumpur Fire and Rescue Department director Edwin Galan Teruki and investigating officer Halim Zulkefeli, in which they concluded that the fire was deliberately lit

    ['appeal', 'samirah', 'teenager', 'murder', 'nazrin']

    Rahmat Mohamed Hazlan, one of their lawyers, when contacted, confirmed the case management on Sept 5 will be conducted via Zoom before a Court of Appeal deputy registrar

    On June 21, this year, the Shah Alam High Court acquitted and discharged Samirah, 47, who is Nazrin's widow and the two teenagers aged 19 and 16 after finding that the prosecution failed to establish a prima facie case against the trio

    In his decision, the judge ruled that the evidence that Samirah and the teenagers were the last persons with the Nazrin, cannot be said to lead to his murder

    On June 23, the Attorney General's Chambers filed its notice of appeal against the High Court's decision to acquit Samirah and the teenagers from the murder charge

    Meanwhile, on June 30, Samirah and the teenagers also filed an appeal to challenge certain of the High Court's findings of facts including the findings that the fire which broke out in Nazrin's room was "done deliberately"

    The High Court judge, in his oral judgment, had said the court accepted the testimonies of the Kuala Lumpur Fire and Rescue Department director Edwin Galan Teruki and investigating officer Halim Zulkefeli, in which they concluded that the fire was deliberately lit

    ['appeal', 'samirah', 'teenager', 'murder', 'nazrin']

  • INTRODUCING: THE FIRST ORIS DIVERS SIXTY-FIVE WITH CALIBER 400 TO ENTER SERIAL PRODUCTION HAS A SURPRISE BEZEL (LIVE PICS & PRICING)

    https://www.hodinkee.com/articles/oris-d65-12h-embargo

    08/29/2022, 16:07

    90.0% Shortened!

    Oris just announced a pretty sweet tool watch as part of Geneva Watch Days, which kicked off today in Switzerland

    The new release is part of the main Divers Sixty-Five collection, features the company's in-house-designed caliber 400, and has an unexpected bezel format, featuring 12 one-hour markers

    Believe it or not, today's release is actually the very first Divers Sixty-Five with the caliber 400 to enter serial production

    The Oris Divers Sixty-Five Caliber 400 12H is offered on either a black leather strap or a stainless steel bracelet

    In my view, the Divers Sixty-Five is Oris' way of exploring vintage tool watch design, using its own history in the category through the mid-1960s Oris Star collection as a platform

    As for me, I think I'll stick with my Divers Sixty-Five Caliber 400 Limited Edition for HODINKEE

    ['watch', 'bezel', 'oris', 'diver', 'caliber']

    Oris just announced a pretty sweet tool watch as part of Geneva Watch Days, which kicked off today in Switzerland

    The new release is part of the main Divers Sixty-Five collection, features the company's in-house-designed caliber 400, and has an unexpected bezel format, featuring 12 one-hour markers

    Believe it or not, today's release is actually the very first Divers Sixty-Five with the caliber 400 to enter serial production

    The Oris Divers Sixty-Five Caliber 400 12H is offered on either a black leather strap or a stainless steel bracelet

    In my view, the Divers Sixty-Five is Oris' way of exploring vintage tool watch design, using its own history in the category through the mid-1960s Oris Star collection as a platform

    As for me, I think I'll stick with my Divers Sixty-Five Caliber 400 Limited Edition for HODINKEE

    ['watch', 'bezel', 'oris', 'diver', 'caliber']

    08/29/2022, 16:07

    The Xbox dashboard has seen a few interesting updates in recent times, most notably perhaps the inclusion of Discord as part of the Xbox Insider Program

    For example, the full "owned games" list doesn't exactly need to show you "recent additions" or "leaving soon" filters, which is exactly what the Xbox Game Pass tab has instead

    Recently, Ubisoft+ assets were discovered by Aggiornamenti Lumia on Twitter in Xbox's back-end

    It lends further fuel to earlier rumors that Microsoft may be exploring a partnership with the Assassin's Creed publisher, in a collaboration that could be similar to what Xbox Game Pass has with EA Play

    Xbox has been hard at work adding features and content to its own Xbox Game Pass service, with a Friends & Family plan just over the horizon.  The new Xbox Games & Apps library is available now as part of the Xbox Insider Program, and will likely roll out to the general public in the coming weeks.  Jez Corden is a Senior Editor for Windows Central, focusing primarily on all things Xbox and gaming

    The 4GB RAM + 64GB storage model costs 10,499, and the 6GB RAM + 128Gb of storage model costs 12,499, which is 2,000 less for each

    It only comes in one model with 8GB RAM and 128GB of storage

    The model with 4GB RAM and 128GB storage costs $15,499 USD

    They can also sponsor their dependents to join them in Singapore and their spouses can work with a letter of consent

    MOM said that the top talent who qualify for the new pass would likely have been able to enter Singapore under the existing EP framework, but the additional flexibility strengthens Singapore’s attraction as a global hub for talent

  • NEW BULGARI PINK GOLD OCTO FINISSIMO GMT AND OCTO FINISSIMO AUTOMATIC IN YELLOW AND PINK GOLD

    https://www.hodinkee.com/articles/bulgari-celebrates-10-years-of-the-octo-line-by-going-for-the-gold

    08/29/2022, 15:10

    85.37% Shortened!

    The Chronograph GMT Automatic Earlier this year the good folks at Bulgari released two slightly funky, titanium 'Sketch' Octo Finissimo watches, an Octo Finissimo Automatic and an Octo Finissimo Chronograph GMT, to celebrate 10 years of the Octo line

    The GMT Chronograph gets a rose gold makeover while the Automatic gets punched up in either rose or yellow gold.  The Chronograph GMT Automatic is a cool 3.3mm thick (still the slimmest chrono out there, honey) and runs on the automatic BVL Calibre 318, just like the 'Sketch' GMT from March

    The 43mm case is satin-brushed rose gold, with a brown lacquered dial, applied rose gold indexes, and a brown alligator strap.  The Automatics in rose and yellow gold, while not entirely new, are new to this version of the OFA, and in the case of the yellow gold, very limited

    James went hands-on with the brushed gold Octo Finissimo Automatic in 2020 and there are a few very subtle changes (the new version of the BVL 138 movement has a new automatic winding system and structure for the escapement and balance, according to Bulgari) as well as a few more obvious updates (the dial is brown now! The bracelet and case are a mix of brushed and polished!).  Yellow gold Octo Finissimo Automatic The yellow gold version of the OFA is an extremely limited American-only LE of 50 pieces to celebrate the 50th Anniversary of the first Bulgari boutique in the States

    From the pictures, the combination of the rose gold and brown lacquered dial gives the GMT a pleasantly '70s (almost "Root Beer") vibe and warms up what can be something of a cold watch.  Nothing is more celebratory than decking oneself out in gold and cultivating an air of exclusivity, so I think the yellow gold automatic is about as on-the-nose as you can get for an anniversary watch

    Rose gold version of the Octo Finissimo Automatic.  I am curious to see how the wrist presence of the watch changes with the precious metal

    ['watch', 'octo', 'gold', 'chronograph', 'automatic']

    The Chronograph GMT Automatic Earlier this year the good folks at Bulgari released two slightly funky, titanium 'Sketch' Octo Finissimo watches, an Octo Finissimo Automatic and an Octo Finissimo Chronograph GMT, to celebrate 10 years of the Octo line

    The GMT Chronograph gets a rose gold makeover while the Automatic gets punched up in either rose or yellow gold.  The Chronograph GMT Automatic is a cool 3.3mm thick (still the slimmest chrono out there, honey) and runs on the automatic BVL Calibre 318, just like the 'Sketch' GMT from March

    The 43mm case is satin-brushed rose gold, with a brown lacquered dial, applied rose gold indexes, and a brown alligator strap.  The Automatics in rose and yellow gold, while not entirely new, are new to this version of the OFA, and in the case of the yellow gold, very limited

    James went hands-on with the brushed gold Octo Finissimo Automatic in 2020 and there are a few very subtle changes (the new version of the BVL 138 movement has a new automatic winding system and structure for the escapement and balance, according to Bulgari) as well as a few more obvious updates (the dial is brown now! The bracelet and case are a mix of brushed and polished!).  Yellow gold Octo Finissimo Automatic The yellow gold version of the OFA is an extremely limited American-only LE of 50 pieces to celebrate the 50th Anniversary of the first Bulgari boutique in the States

    From the pictures, the combination of the rose gold and brown lacquered dial gives the GMT a pleasantly '70s (almost "Root Beer") vibe and warms up what can be something of a cold watch.  Nothing is more celebratory than decking oneself out in gold and cultivating an air of exclusivity, so I think the yellow gold automatic is about as on-the-nose as you can get for an anniversary watch

    Rose gold version of the Octo Finissimo Automatic.  I am curious to see how the wrist presence of the watch changes with the precious metal

    ['watch', 'octo', 'gold', 'chronograph', 'automatic']



  • LAST WALK ON THE BEACH FOR ELDERLY WOMAN AFTER BODY FOUND ON TANJUNG ARU SHORES

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/08/29/last-walk-on-the-beach-for-elderly-woman-after-body-found-on-tanjung-aru-shores

    08/29/2022, 15:09

    60.0% Shortened!

    Monday, 29 Aug 2022

    A passer-by stumbled upon the 73-year-old woman’s lifeless body lying on the shore and immediately alerted the police at about 6.45am on Monday (Aug 29)

    City police chief OCPD Asst Comm Mohd Zaidi Abdullah said the passer-by spotted the body near a meteorology station at Tanjung Aru Beach 3

    He said policemen from the nearby Tanjung Aru police station subsequently rushed to the location after the distress call

    He, however, advised witnesses to the incident to get in touch with the police.

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

  • SAMSUNG TO UPDATE MILLIONS OF OLD PHONES

    https://mmnews.tv/samsung-to-update-millions-of-old-phones/

    08/29/2022, 15:09

    60.0% Shortened!

    Home » Latest News » Samsung to update millions of old phones There may be half a billion individuals still using Samsung Galaxy phones from around 2014 to 2018, and they should check for firmware updates as the Korean cell phone manufacturer announced to update millions of aging phone

    The affected models include the Galaxy S5 Neo (Vodafone’s version), Galaxy Alpha, Galaxy S6 series, and the Galaxy A7

    Galaxy S5 owners should look for firmware version G903FXXU2BFG3 in the settings app

    Galaxy S6 phones receive firmware version G92xFXXU6EVG1, the Galaxy Alpha gets version G850FXXU2CVH9, and the A7 receives A750FXXU5CVG1

    The update for the A7 includes a security patch

    Last year, Samsung promised that new Galaxy phones would receive security updates for at least four years

    ['samsung', 'update', 'old', 'phone', 'galaxy']

  • SONY XPERIA 5 IV SPEC SECRETS REVEALED IN SHADOWY GEEKBENCH RECORD AS NEW PROMO TEASER GOES LIVE

    https://www.notebookcheck.net/Sony-Xperia-5-IV-spec-secrets-revealed-in-shadowy-Geekbench-record-as-new-promo-teaser-goes-live.643612.0.html

    08/29/2022, 15:08

    50.0% Shortened!

    An interesting report from SmartphoneDigest has claimed that the Sony Xperia 5 IV has turned up on Geekbench, which in turn has revealed some of the compact flagship smartphone’s specifications

    According to the report, the codename Sony XQ-CQ62 pertains to the Sony Xperia 5 IV (apparently the US variant), which makes sense as the XQ-CQ part has been associated with the Xperia 5 range in the past

    There were some hopes for the Plus variant to be planted into the Mark 4 model of the Xperia 5 but these were optimistic

    Further evidence of the chip being the regular variant is the 1-core speed of 3.00 GHz

    The top clock rate for the Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1 is 3.2 GHz, and this does have an effect in synthetic benchmark such as Geekbench

    In addition, the RAM amount states “6.91 GB”, which signposts to a total of 8 GB of memory for the Sony Xperia 5 IV, which would be the same amount as its predecessor

    ['report', 'sony', 'xperia', 'geekbench', 'point']

    There were some hopes for the Plus variant to be planted into the Mark 4 model of the Xperia 5 but these were optimistic

    Further evidence of the chip being the regular variant is the 1-core speed of 3.00 GHz

    The top clock rate for the Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1 is 3.2 GHz, and this does have an effect in synthetic benchmark such as Geekbench

    In addition, the RAM amount states “6.91 GB”, which signposts to a total of 8 GB of memory for the Sony Xperia 5 IV, which would be the same amount as its predecessor

  • XIAOMI TO LAUNCH ITS NEXT ULTRA SERIES SMARTPHONE GLOBALLY, CONFIRMS CEO LEI JUN

    https://www.news9live.com/technology/mobile-phone/xiaomi-to-launch-its-next-ultra-series-smartphone-globally-confirms-ceo-lei-jun-192469

    08/29/2022, 15:08

    75.0% Shortened!

    The smartphone also featured a 1-inch 50 MP camera with a DSLR-like module, which also gained some recognition

    However, the phone didn't see a global release and was only launched in China, but the company's CEO, Lei Jun, has now confirmed that things are going to be a little different next time as Xiaomi will be launching its next Ultra series smartphone in the global market

    The executive tweeted, "The next iteration of Ultra will be available in our global markets!" The Xiaomi 12S Ultra features three cameras, with a 50 MP one-inch primary camera that comes with a new Sony IMX989 sensor

    This is assisted by a 48 MP ultra-wide lens with a 129-degree field of view and a 48 MP telephoto lens with 120x zoom support

    A few weeks back, we reported that Xiaomi's 12T Pro might soon make its global debut

    As per the tipster, Google Play's listing suggests that the Xiaomi 12T Pro will launch globally as a rebranded Redmi K50 Ultra, which was unveiled in China on August 11, alongside the Xiaomi MIX Fold 2

    ['xiaomi', 'ultra', 'camera', 'device', 'smartphone']

    The smartphone also featured a 1-inch 50 MP camera with a DSLR-like module, which also gained some recognition

    However, the phone didn't see a global release and was only launched in China, but the company's CEO, Lei Jun, has now confirmed that things are going to be a little different next time as Xiaomi will be launching its next Ultra series smartphone in the global market

    The executive tweeted, "The next iteration of Ultra will be available in our global markets!" The Xiaomi 12S Ultra features three cameras, with a 50 MP one-inch primary camera that comes with a new Sony IMX989 sensor

    This is assisted by a 48 MP ultra-wide lens with a 129-degree field of view and a 48 MP telephoto lens with 120x zoom support

    Amazon is not going to make a bid for Electronic Arts, sources tell CNBC's @DavidFaber

    Overall, it looks like nothing much has changed since the initial Puck report back in May

  • PROSPERITY TAX CRIMPS PUBLIC BANK'S 2Q NET PROFIT GROWTH, EIGHT SEN INTERIM DIVIDEND DECLARED

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/article/prosperity-tax-crimps-public-banks-2q-net-profit-growth-eight-sen-interim-dividend-declared

    08/29/2022, 15:07

    76.92% Shortened!

    Meanwhile, revenue for the quarter rose slightly to RM4.97 billion from RM4.92 billion a year ago

    For 1HFY22, Public Bank’s net profit dipped to RM2.82 billion from RM2.91 billion a year ago, due to the imposition of the prosperity tax

    EPS fell to 14.50 sen from 15.01 sen, while revenue also slipped to RM9.86 billion from RM9.95 billion for 1HFY21

    Public Bank’s loans rose at an annualised rate of 5.6% to RM368 billion, from RM358 billion as at end-December 2021

    “The Public Bank group’s liquidity and funding structure remained healthy, with the gross loan to fund and equity ratio at 81% as at June 30,” said Teh

    Teh added that the group’s loan loss coverage ratio as at end-June stood at 388.8%

    ['public', 'bank', 'billion', 'year', 'net']

    Monday, 29 Aug 2022

    "There should not be any doubt and a judge must be free from any influence or pressure

    "If the basis and grounds of the judgment are weak, the appellant has the right to argue that the judge erred in his judgment and apply for the case to be reviewed by a higher court

    "The opportunity to appeal is a right guaranteed by law, becoming a venue for a higher court judge to review the grounds of judgment by the lower court judges; whether there is a mistake or not," he said

    Hie expressed the need for efforts to improve the Syariah judicial system and empower the Syariah Court.

    "Publishing the Al-Qanun, the Perak Syariah Journal is an example of a noble and commendable effort

  • NAJIB'S LAWYERS THREATEN LEGAL ACTION AGAINST MALAYSIAN BAR PRESIDENT FOR DEFAMATION

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/08/29/najibs-lawyers-threaten-legal-action-against-malaysian-bar-president-for-defamation/25318

    08/29/2022, 13:09

    50.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Aug 29 — Three lawyers involved in former prime minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak's SRC International case today threatened to sue the Malaysian Bar over a press statement that claimed the lawyers were unprofessional, unless a "full and unequivocal retraction and apology" was given

    According to Free Malaysia Today, lawyers Datuk Mohd Zaid Ibrahim, Liew Teck Huat and Rueben Mathiavanam said they would initiate legal action against Bar president Karen Cheah Yee Lynn if she does not apologise and retract the statement on their conduct in Najib's appeal in the Federal Court within five days

    The press statement was picked up and reported in various local media on the same day

    that Najib’s case had attracted wide international media coverage and that your imputations would be disseminated to the international community as well,” they said in a letter issued via their law firm Zaid Ibrahim Suflan TH Liew & Partners on Aug 26

    On top of an apology, the letter warned the Bar president to not make such statements again

    After being denied by the court for additional time to prepare for the appeal, Najib dropped the firm and the lawyers from representing him

    ['aug', 'lawyer', 'najib', 'international', 'bar']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Aug 29 — Three lawyers involved in former prime minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak's SRC International case today threatened to sue the Malaysian Bar over a press statement that claimed the lawyers were unprofessional, unless a "full and unequivocal retraction and apology" was given

    According to Free Malaysia Today, lawyers Datuk Mohd Zaid Ibrahim, Liew Teck Huat and Rueben Mathiavanam said they would initiate legal action against Bar president Karen Cheah Yee Lynn if she does not apologise and retract the statement on their conduct in Najib's appeal in the Federal Court within five days

    The press statement was picked up and reported in various local media on the same day

    that Najib’s case had attracted wide international media coverage and that your imputations would be disseminated to the international community as well,” they said in a letter issued via their law firm Zaid Ibrahim Suflan TH Liew & Partners on Aug 26

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/08/29/in-court-zahid-laments-selective-prosecution-after-ge14-says-bn-leaders-like-him-charged-while-pakatan-politicians-freed/25315

    08/29/2022, 12:11

    57.14% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Aug 29 — Umno president Datuk Seri Ahmad Zahid Hamidi today again insisted that he faced politically-motivated prosecution after the Barisan Nasional coalition lost in the 14th general election (GE14) in May 2018

    While the party who lost, besides me, Datuk Seri Najib, Umno's secretary-general itself YB Datuk Seri Ahmad Maslan, Umno treasurer YB Tengku Adnan and around 18 more leaders from my party were also brought to court

    And there were more than 81 division leaders that were also forced to be hauled to and charged in court who allegedly obtained funds from an organisation under the administration of the former prime minister," he claimed in the High Court today

    "So these examples, I consider, and the public perception also considers this to be political prosecution or selective prosecution," he claimed

    Ahmad Zahid then spoke of his trust in the court being just and that justice is a correct legal system, but then suggested that the legal system should not be used to take revenge

    Ahmad Zahid also claimed that there was a trial carried out in the court of public opinion when referring to his 47 charges in this trial alone

    ['ahmad', 'zahid', 'prosecution', 'court', 'claimed']

    08/29/2022, 12:09

    53.85% Shortened!

    Abang Johari delivering his speech during an event on Aug 15, 2022

    “The Sarawak government will continue with the initiative to provide 5 to 25 per cent discount on monthly electricity bills of domestic households and of commercial and industrial users – including food operators and retailers

    Aside from that, Abang Johari said discount of 25 per cent will be given for assessment rates exceeding RM400 a year and 30 per cent discount for assessment rates below RM400 for residential, commercial, industrial and special holdings from July to December this year

    This measure will benefit more than 500,000 premises under the local authorities (PBT) and at the same time ease the burden on the people and traders in Sarawak, costing the state government RM54 million, he added

    As at June this year, Malaysia’s inflation rate increased by 3.4 per cent compared to the same month last year; while Sarawak’s inflation rate increased by 3.2 per cent compared to the same period last year

    “As a government that listens and is concerned about the people’s complaints, the Sarawak government has decided to continue providing assistance to ease the burden of the people of Sarawak who are affected by the increase in the cost of living, especially those with low income,” Abang Johari said.

    According to the source, the width of the middle section of the frame of the Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra will be made larger, and in return this will force the curved display to be a little less curvy

    This might be due to practical reasons, as it is rumored that Samsung will pack as much as possible into the Galaxy S23 Ultra, including a new Qualcomm 3D Sonic Max ultrasonic in-display fingerprint sensor and, hopefully, UFS 4.0 storage

    So, with that in mind, Ice universe says pretty much the same thing about the Samsung Galaxy S23 and Samsung Galaxy S23+ (Plus)

  • AZALINA URGES MPS TO SUPPORT PRIVATE MEMBER'S BILL TO ALLOW M'SIAN MUMS CONFER CITIZENSHIP TO OVERSEAS BORN CHILDREN

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/08/29/azalina-urges-mps-to-support-private-member039s-bill-to-allow-msian-mums-confer-citizenship-to-overseas-born-children

    08/29/2022, 12:09

    73.91% Shortened!

    Azalina added that 1.86 million Malaysian women are living overseas, citing reasons for citizenship issues as one of the main factors deterring their return to Malaysia

    A Private Member’s Bill is a bill (proposed law) submitted by MPs who are not from the executive branch of the government

    She further explained that the issue of citizenship is not a mere issue of gender inequality

    In September last year, the High Court ruled that Malaysian women have the same right as Malaysian men to confer automatic citizenship on their overseas-born children

    In a majority ruling, the court held that the constitutional provision referred to the biological father and could not be extended to include the mother or parents

    It was up to Parliament, not the court, to rewrite the constitution, the judges said

    ['woman', 'child', 'citizenship', 'malaysian', 'mother']

    08/29/2022, 12:08

    66.67% Shortened!

    In the latest, the platform has announced that it will set the Sensitive Content Control settings at "Less" for teens under the age of the 16

    The other option is "Standard", which, if a user in that age bracket desires, will have to be turned on manually

    This means that teens under the age group under 16 will now be less exposed to potentially sensitive content or accounts, which could be damaging and age inappropriate

    The earlier setting limited sensitive content from the Explore section of the app, whereas after the expansion, it was blocked across all recommendations and in-app offerings

    Instagram's definition of 'sensitive content' has been long debated, with the company describing it as something that against its recommendation guidelines, and is generally upsetting, offensive, or sensitive

  • THINK INSTAGRAM SUCKS LATELY? HERE'S WHY – REELS HAVE PRIORITY OVER EVERYTHING ELSE

    https://www.digitalmusicnews.com/2022/08/28/instagram-sucks-why-reels-priority/

    08/29/2022, 12:08

    53.85% Shortened!

    Now that they’re here, Meta seems to be promoting Reels content over other types

    HypeAuditor analyzed 77.6 million Instagram posts to discover how different types of content flourish

    The most popular type of content in July 2022 was the Image post, with 42.2% of posts analyzed being image posts

    Reels took the third spot, with 22.1% of the content in July 2022 being Reels

    Instagram is heavily favoring Reels content, which relies on the discovery algorithm

    Reels prioritizes the discovery of new content by letting an algorithm serve up content from people you don’t follow but that it thinks you might like.

  • MALAYSIA'S INFLATION RISES TO 4.4% IN JULY

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2022/08/29/malaysia039s-inflation-rises-44-in-july

    08/29/2022, 12:07

    60.0% Shortened!

    The increase in the consumer price index (CPI), the highest since April 2021, was in line with the median forecast of a Reuters poll of analysts

    Announcing the July inflation data in a statement, the National Statistics Department said the increase in inflation was also due to the low base effect last year as a result of the electricity bill discount from 5% to 40% according to total usage given to domestic consumers

    For July, the food index rose 6.9%, serving as the main contributor the increase in overall inflation

    The core inflation and inflation without fuel registered an increase of 3.4% and 4.2% respectively in July 2022 as compared to the same month of the preceding year

    On a monthly basis, the inflation increased 0.4% as compared to June

    For the January to July period, the inflation increased 2.8% as compared to the same period last year.

    ['inflation', 'july', 'year', 'food', 'increase']

    The core inflation and inflation without fuel registered an increase of 3.4% and 4.2% respectively in July 2022 as compared to the same month of the preceding year

    For the January to July period, the inflation increased 2.8% as compared to the same period last year.

  • ZAID, PARTNERS TO SUE BAR PRESIDENT FOR DEFAMATION UNLESS APOLOGY TENDERED

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/29/zaid-partners-to-sue-bar-president-for-defamation-unless-apology-tendered/

    08/29/2022, 11:10

    65.0% Shortened!

    Zaid, Liew Teck Huat and Rueben Mathiavanam say they will initiate legal action against Cheah if the retraction and apology are not forthcoming by Sept 2

    They allege that the press release on Aug 19, which formed the basis of news reports appearing in the Edge, Malay Mail and The Star on the same day, “falsely and maliciously” contained statements concerning their conduct in Najib’s appeal in the Federal Court

    Issued on Aug 26 via their law firm, Zaid Ibrahim Suflan TH Liew & Partners, the letter identifies several paragraphs in Cheah’s press statement which the lawyers claim showed a “reckless disregard as to whether the imputations complained of (were) true”

    Najib had on July 25 appointed Zaid’s law firm to replace Shafee & Co as solicitors in his final SRC International criminal appeal before the Federal Court, with Hisyam Teh Poh Teik roped in to be lead counsel in place of Shafee Abdullah

    After the apex court turned down several requests for additional time to prepare for the appeal, Najib discharged the firm as solicitors as well as Zaid, Liew and Rueben as co-counsel on Aug 18

    On Aug 23, the Federal Court unanimously affirmed Najib’s conviction on all seven charges of abuse of power, criminal breach of trust and money laundering brought in respect of SRC International funds totalling RM42 million

    The conviction and sentence were first handed down by the Kuala Lumpur High Court on July 28, 2020 and affirmed by the Court of Appeal on Dec 8 last year

    ['lawyer', 'zaid', 'cheah', 'statement', 'najib']

    Zaid, Liew Teck Huat and Rueben Mathiavanam say they will initiate legal action against Cheah if the retraction and apology are not forthcoming by Sept 2

    They allege that the press release on Aug 19, which formed the basis of news reports appearing in the Edge, Malay Mail and The Star on the same day, “falsely and maliciously” contained statements concerning their conduct in Najib’s appeal in the Federal Court

    Issued on Aug 26 via their law firm, Zaid Ibrahim Suflan TH Liew & Partners, the letter identifies several paragraphs in Cheah’s press statement which the lawyers claim showed a “reckless disregard as to whether the imputations complained of (were) true”

    Najib had on July 25 appointed Zaid’s law firm to replace Shafee & Co as solicitors in his final SRC International criminal appeal before the Federal Court, with Hisyam Teh Poh Teik roped in to be lead counsel in place of Shafee Abdullah

    After the apex court turned down several requests for additional time to prepare for the appeal, Najib discharged the firm as solicitors as well as Zaid, Liew and Rueben as co-counsel on Aug 18

    On Aug 23, the Federal Court unanimously affirmed Najib’s conviction on all seven charges of abuse of power, criminal breach of trust and money laundering brought in respect of SRC International funds totalling RM42 million

    The conviction and sentence were first handed down by the Kuala Lumpur High Court on July 28, 2020 and affirmed by the Court of Appeal on Dec 8 last year

  • 3M BANKRUPTCY TACTIC FAILS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2022/08/29/3m-bankruptcy-tactic-fails

    08/29/2022, 11:07

    76.92% Shortened!

    An Indiana bankruptcy judge last Friday rejected 3M’s bid to temporarily halt the avalanche of lawsuits accusing the manufacturing giant and a bankrupt subsidiary of selling faulty combat earplugs

    3M said it would appeal, but that was little relief for investors, who sent its shares down the most in the S&P 500 Index by last Friday’s close

    “The expectation was that 3M’s bankruptcy strategy would be vigorously contested.” 3M announced the surprise move to put its Aearo subsidiary into bankruptcy late last month as it reported second-quarter earnings, and plans to spin off its massive health-care products division

    But last Friday’s bankruptcy decision threatens to keep 3M under a cloud of uncertainty, at least until the appeals process runs its course

    That process is being overseen by a federal judge in Florida

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['plan', 'bankruptcy', 'earplug', 'last', 'friday']

    Google's Nearby Share already does an excellent job of transferring files to Chromebooks and Android devices, but with the release of a new cross-device software development kit, the company hopes to make it easier to use Android apps across all types of devices

    It is also backwards compatible with Android 8

    For the time being, the SDK is compatible only with Android phones and tablets, but Google vows to extend the cross-device experience to "Android surfaces and non-Android OSs" such as watches, TVs, and cars in the future

    08/29/2022

    82.86% Shortened!

    Why didn’t you call me directly to ask about my speech at the Umno gathering last Saturday? After all, we have had a respectful professional working relationship for months on the Anti-Hopping Law and I gladly accepted Bersih’s invitation to co-chair the Caucus on Reform Agenda

    A former law practitioner since 1990, and a lawmaker since 2004, I would be the last to condone any intervention of judiciary by the executive or legislature

    I was asked to speak at last Saturday’s gathering as the Legal Advisor to Barisan Nasional and as the Member of Parliament for Pengerang

    The crux of my speech is to raise the legal right of a citizen of Malaysia, or any citizen of Malaysia for that matter to appeal in the court of law

    He is the chief legal advisor to the Government and represents the government

    This is not my intention, nor the intention of the Special Meeting held last Saturday
